entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
